EmailTemplate.name: RS - Application Receipt w/Avidia
EmailTemplate.subject: BlueWave - Application Received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for submitting your Solar Loan application to BlueWave.
You will receive notice on your application status within the next two business days. Upon application approval, we will send you final documentation to complete your enrollment with BlueWave.
To open your Avidia Bank Account, please click here.
In the meantime, if you have any questions, please feel free to email us at customercare@bluewavesolar.com, we can also be reached at (844) 786 - 4100.
Thank you,
BlueWave Customer Care
